title: On $GL(1|1)$ Higgs bundles
summary: We investigate the moduli space of holomorphic $GL(1|1)$ Higgs bundles over a compact Riemann surface. The supergroup $GL(1|1)$, the simplest non-trivial example beyond abelian cases, provides an ideal setting for developing supergeometric analogues of classical results in Higgs bundle theory. We derive an explicit description of the moduli space and we study the analogue of the Narasimhan-Seshadri theorem as well as the nonabelian Hodge correspondence. Furthermore, we formulate and solve the corresponding Hitchin equations, demonstrating their compatibility with fermionic contributions. As a highlight, we discuss the related Hitchin system on $\mathbb{P}^1$ and its integrability.

title: Stable envelopes for critical loci
summary: This is the first in a sequence of papers devoted to stable envelopes in critical cohomology and critical $K$-theory for symmetric GIT quotients with potentials and related geometries, and their applications to geometric representation theory and enumerative geometry. In this paper, we construct critical stable envelopes and establish their general properties, including compatibility with dimensional reductions, specializations, Hall products, and other geometric constructions. In particular, for tripled quivers with canonical cubic potentials, the critical stable envelopes reproduce those on Nakajima quiver varieties. These set up foundations for applications in subsequent papers.

title: Moduli of surfaces fibered in (log) Calabi-Yau pairs II: elliptic surfaces
comment: 29 pages, 3 figures and 2 tables; comments are welcome
summary:
This paper continues the study initiated in [ISZ25] on the moduli of surfaces admitting lc-trivial fibrations. Using the techniques developed in [ISZ25], we
  (1) provide a classification of the surfaces appearing on the boundary of the KSBA-moduli space of elliptic surfaces with a bisection
  (2) recover the results of a series of papers on the moduli stacks of elliptic surfaces with a section [AB22, Inc20, Bru15].
  Notably, our proof of (2) avoids the use of explicit steps of an MMP, such as the "La Nave flip" from [LN02], which plays a central role in [AB22,Inc20].

AI.motivation: 继续[ISZ25]中关于具有lc-平凡纤维化曲面模空间的研究，旨在更深入地理解椭圆曲面模空间的边界结构，并简化已有结果的证明方法。

title: Push-forward of smooth measures and strong Thom stratifications
summary: We study the collection of measures obtained via push-forward along a map between smooth varieties over p-adic fields. We investigate when the stalks of this collection are finite-dimensional. We provide an algebro-geometric criterion ensuring this property. This criterion is formulated in terms of a canonical subvariety of the cotangent bundle of the source of the map.

title: A new kind of automorphic form and a proof of the essential transformation laws
summary: We utilize the structure of quasiautomorphic forms over an arbitrary Hecke triangle group to define a new vector analogue of an automorphic form. We supply a proof of the functional equations that hold for these functions modulo the group generators.

title: Rank three representations of Painlevé systems: II. de Rham structure, Fourier--Laplace transformation
summary: We use formal microlocalization to describe the Fourier--Laplace transformation between rank 3 and rank 2 D-module representations of Painleve systems. We conclude the existence of biregular morphism between the corresponding de Rham complex structures.

summary: We express the branch points cross ratio of cyclic Mumford curves as quotients of $p$-adic theta functions evaluated at the p-adic period matrix

title: Admissible HYM metrics on klt KE varieties and the MY equality for big anticanonical K-stable varieties
summary: This short note includes three results: $(1)$ If a reflexive sheaf $\mathcal{E}$ on a log terminal Kähler-Einstein variety $(X,ω)$ is slope stable with respect to a singular Kähler-Einstein metric $ω$, then $\mathcal{E}$ admits an $ω$-admissible Hermitian-Yang-Mills metric. $(2)$ If a K-stable log terminal projective variety with big anti-canonical divisor satisfies the equality of the Miyaoka-Yau inequality in the sense of \cite{IJZ25}, then its anti-canonical model admits a quasi-étale cover from $\mathbb{C}P^n$. $(3)$ There exists a holomorphic rank 3 vector bundle on a compact complex surface which is semistable for some nef and big line bundle, but it is not semistable for any ample line bundles.

AI.tldr: 该论文包含三个主要结果：1）在log terminal Kähler-Einstein簇上，关于奇异Kähler-Einstein度量斜率稳定的自反层存在ω-容许Hermitian-Yang-Mills度量；2）满足Miyaoka-Yau等式的大反典除子的K-稳定log terminal射影簇的反典模型有来自ℂPⁿ的拟étale覆盖；3）存在紧复曲面上的全纯秩3向量丛，对某些nef且大的线丛半稳定，但对任何丰沛线丛都不半稳定。
AI.motivation: 研究代数几何与复几何中的稳定性条件与度量结构之间的关系，探索K-稳定性、斜率稳定性与Hermitian-Yang-Mills度量之间的对应关系，以及Miyaoka-Yau不等式在特殊几何结构中的表现。
AI.method: 采用复几何与代数几何相结合的方法，利用log terminal Kähler-Einstein簇的奇异度量理论，结合K-稳定性理论和Miyaoka-Yau不等式，通过构造性反例和理论分析来证明三个主要结果。

summary: Let l be a prime number and let E and E' be l-isogenous elliptic curves defined over Q. In this paper we determine the proportion of primes p for which E(F_p) is isomorphic to E'(F_p). Our techniques are based on those developed in \cite{ck} and \cite{rnt}.

title: On the 1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_2\times\mathbb{Z}_2$-vertex
summary: We introduce a notion of restricted pyramid configurations for computing the 1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_2\times\mathbb{Z}_2$-vertex. We study a special type of restricted pyramid configurations with the prescribed 1-leg partitions, and find one unique class of them satisfying the symmetric interlacing property. This leads us to obtain an explicit formula for a class of 1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_2\times\mathbb{Z}_2$-vertex through establishing its connection with 1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_4$-vertex using the vertex operator methods of Okounkov-Reshetikhin-Vafa and Bryan-Young.

AI.tldr: 该论文引入了受限金字塔配置的概念来计算1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_2\times\mathbb{Z}_2$-顶点，通过研究具有特定1-leg划分的特殊类型配置，找到了满足对称交错性质的唯一类别，从而建立了与1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_4$-顶点的联系并获得了显式公式。
AI.motivation: 研究Donaldson-Thomas不变量在弦理论中的几何计数问题，特别是针对具有特定对称性（$\mathbb{Z}_2\times\mathbb{Z}_2$）的1-leg顶点计算，旨在建立不同对称群顶点之间的联系并获得显式计算公式。

title: Integrality of a trigonometric determinant arising from a conjecture of Sun
summary: In this paper we resolve a conjecture of Zhi-Wei Sun concerning the integrality and arithmetic structure of certain trigonometric determinants. Our approach builds on techniques developed in our previous work, where trigonometric determinants were studied via special values of Dirichlet $L$-functions. The method is refined by establishing a connection between odd characters modulo $4n$ and even characters modulo $n$. The results highlight a close connection between trigonometric determinant matrices, Fourier-analytic structures, and arithmetic invariants.

AI.tldr: 本文解决了孙智伟关于某些三角行列式的整数性和算术结构的猜想，通过建立模4n的奇特征标与模n的偶特征标之间的联系，改进了先前基于狄利克雷L函数特殊值的方法。

title: Geometric Eisenstein series in non-abelian Hodge theory and hyperholomorphic branes from supersymmetry
summary: Using geometric Eisenstein series, foundational work of Arinkin and Gaitsgory constructs cuspidal-Eisenstein decompositions for ind-coherent nilpotent sheaves on the de Rham moduli of local systems. This article extends these constructions to coherent (not ind-coherent) nilpotent sheaves on the Dolbeault, Hodge and twistor moduli from non-abelian Hodge theory. We thus account for Higgs bundles, Hodge filtrations and hyperkähler rotations of local systems. In particular, our constructions are shown to decompose a hyperholomorphic sheaf theory of so-called BBB-branes into cuspidal and Eisenstein components. Our work is motivated, on the one hand, by the `classical limit' or `Dolbeault geometric Langlands conjecture' of Donagi and Pantev, and on the other, by attempts to interpret Kapustin and Witten's physical duality between BBB-branes and BAA-branes in 4D supersymmetric Yang--Mills theories as a mathematical statement within the geometric Langlands program.

AI.tldr: 该论文将Arinkin和Gaitsgory的几何Eisenstein级数构造从de Rham模空间扩展到Dolbeault、Hodge和twistor模空间，为Higgs丛、Hodge过滤和超Kähler旋转提供了cuspidal-Eisenstein分解。
AI.motivation: 研究动机来自两个方面：一是Donagi和Pantev提出的"经典极限"或"Dolbeault几何朗兰兹猜想"；二是试图将Kapustin和Witten在4D超对称Yang-Mills理论中提出的BBB-膜与BAA-膜之间的物理对偶性解释为几何朗兰兹纲领中的数学陈述。
AI.method: 使用几何Eisenstein级数，将Arinkin和Gaitsgory在de Rham模空间上构建的构造扩展到非阿贝尔Hodge理论中的Dolbeault、Hodge和twistor模空间上的相干幂零层。特别关注BBB-膜的超全纯层理论分解。
AI.result: 成功将cuspidal-Eisenstein分解构造扩展到相干幂零层，涵盖了Higgs丛、Hodge过滤和局部系统的超Kähler旋转。证明了这些构造可以将BBB-膜的超全纯层理论分解为cuspidal和Eisenstein分量。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为非阿贝尔Hodge理论中的模空间提供了统一的分解理论框架，连接了几何朗兰兹纲领的de Rham和Dolbeault版本，并为物理对偶性提供了数学解释的基础。

title: Secondary Term for the Mean Value of Maass Special $L$-values
summary:
In this paper, we discover a secondary term in the asymptotic formula for the mean value of Hecke--Maass special $L$-values $ L (1/2+it_f, f) $ with the average over $f (z)$ in an orthonormal basis of (even or odd) Hecke--Maass cusp forms of Laplace eigenvalue $1/4 + t_f^2$ ($t_f > 0$). To be explicit, we prove $$ \sum_{t_f \leqslant T} ω_f L (1/2+it_f, f) = \frac {T^2} {π^2} + \frac {8T^{3/2}} {3π^{3/2} } + O \big(T^{1+\varepsilon}\big), $$
  for any $\varepsilon > 0$, where $ω_f$ are the harmonic weights. This provides a new instance of (large) secondary terms in the moments of $L$-functions -- it was known previously only for the smoothed cubic moment of quadratic Dirichlet $L$-functions. The proof relies on an explicit formula for the smoothed mean value of $L (1/2+it_f, f)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文发现了Hecke-Maass特殊L-值均值渐近公式中的二阶项，这是L-函数矩中（大）二阶项的新实例
AI.motivation: 研究Hecke-Maass尖点形式特殊L-值在中心点1/2+it_f处的均值渐近行为，探索L-函数矩中的二阶项现象
AI.method: 通过平滑均值L(1/2+it_f,f)的显式公式进行证明，利用调和权重ω_f和正交基平均技术
AI.result: 证明了∑_{t_f≤T} ω_f L(1/2+it_f,f) = T²/π² + 8T^{3/2}/(3π^{3/2}) + O(T^{1+ε})，其中包含显著的T^{3/2}阶二阶项
AI.conclusion: 这是L-函数矩中（大）二阶项的新实例，此前仅在二次Dirichlet L-函数的平滑三次矩中已知类似现象

title: Proper moduli spaces of orthosymplectic complexes
summary: We apply the formalism of Alper-Halpern-Leistner-Heinloth to construct proper good moduli spaces for moduli stacks of Bridgeland semistable orthosymplectic complexes on a complex smooth projective variety, which we propose as a candidate for compactifying moduli spaces of principal bundles for the orthogonal and symplectic groups. We also prove some results on good moduli spaces of fixed point stacks and mapping stacks from finite groupoids.

AI.tldr: 该论文应用Alper-Halpern-Leistner-Heinloth形式体系，为复光滑射影簇上的Bridgeland半稳定正交辛复形的模栈构造了真良模空间，并将其作为正交群和辛群主丛模空间的紧化候选。
AI.motivation: 为寻找正交群和辛群主丛模空间的紧化方法，作者提出使用Bridgeland半稳定正交辛复形的模栈，并应用现代模空间理论中的良模空间概念来实现紧化。
AI.method: 应用Alper-Halpern-Leistner-Heinloth形式体系，构造Bridgeland半稳定正交辛复形模栈的真良模空间。同时研究了定点栈和从有限群胚到栈的映射栈的良模空间性质。
AI.result: 成功构造了Bridgeland半稳定正交辛复形模栈的真良模空间，并证明了其作为正交群和辛群主丛模空间紧化候选的合理性。同时获得了关于定点栈和有限群胚映射栈良模空间的一些结果。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为代数几何中模空间紧化问题提供了新方法，特别是为正交群和辛群主丛的模空间紧化提出了可行的理论框架，扩展了良模空间理论的应用范围。

title: Short sums of trace functions over function fields and their applications
summary: For large enough (but fixed) prime powers $q$, and trace functions to squarefree moduli in $\mathbb{F}_q[u]$ with slopes at most $1$ at infinity, and no Artin--Schreier factors in their geometric global monodromy, we come close to square-root cancellation in short sums. A special case is a function field version of Hooley's Hypothesis $R^*$ for short Kloosterman sums. As a result, we are able to make progress on several problems in analytic number theory over $\mathbb{F}_q[u]$ such as Mordell's problem on the least residue class not represented by a polynomial and the variance of short Kloosterman sums.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了有限域上函数域中短和的平方根抵消问题，特别关注了短Kloosterman和，并应用于Mordell问题和短Kloosterman和方差等解析数论问题。
AI.motivation: 研究函数域上短和的平方根抵消问题，特别是短Kloosterman和的Hooley假设R*的函数域版本，以解决有限域上解析数论中的几个重要问题。
AI.method: 对于足够大的固定素数幂q，考虑在𝔽_q[u]中无平方因子的模的迹函数，这些函数在无穷远处的斜率至多为1，且其几何整体单值群中不含Artin-Schreier因子。
AI.result: 在短和中接近平方根抵消，特别证明了函数域版本的Hooley假设R*对于短Kloosterman和成立，从而在𝔽_q[u]上的解析数论问题中取得进展。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为有限域上函数域的短和问题提供了新的理论工具，成功应用于Mordell问题和短Kloosterman和方差等经典问题，推动了函数域解析数论的发展。

title: Tropical methods for building real space sextics with totally real tritangent planes
summary:
This paper proposes the use of combinatorial techniques from tropical geometry to build the 120 tritangent planes to a given smooth algebraic space sextic. Although the tropical count is infinite, tropical tritangents come in 15 equivalence classes, each containing the tropicalization of exactly eight classical tritangents.
  Under mild genericity conditions on the tropical side, we show that liftings of tropical tritangents are defined over quadratic extensions of the ground field over which the input sextic curve is defined. When the input curve is real, we prove that every complex liftable member of a given tropical tritangent class either completely lifts to the reals or none of its liftings are defined over the reals. As our main application we use these methods to build examples of real space sextics with 64 and 120 totally real tritangents, respectively. The paper concludes with a discussion of our results in the arithmetic setting.

AI.tldr: 该论文利用热带几何的组合技术构建给定光滑代数空间六次曲线的120个三切平面。虽然热带计数是无限的，但热带三切面分为15个等价类，每类恰好包含8个经典三切面的热带化。
AI.motivation: 研究空间六次曲线的三切平面问题，特别是实曲线的情况，探索热带几何方法在代数几何经典问题中的应用，并构建具有特定数量全实三切面的实空间六次曲线实例。
AI.method: 采用热带几何的组合技术，分析热带三切平面的等价类结构，研究热带提升的条件，特别关注实曲线的情况，并应用这些方法构建具体实例。
AI.result: 证明了在温和的一般性条件下，热带三切面的提升定义在输入六次曲线定义域上的二次扩张上；对于实曲线，证明了每个热带三切面类的可提升复成员要么完全提升到实数域，要么没有实数提升；构建了具有64和120个全实三切面的实空间六次曲线实例。
AI.conclusion: 热带几何方法为研究空间六次曲线的三切平面提供了有效的组合框架，特别是在实几何和算术设置中，能够构建具有特定实数性质的具体实例，并揭示了热带提升与经典提升之间的深刻联系。

title: Large values of quadratic character sums revisited
summary: We study large values of quadratic character sums with summation lengths exceeding the square root of the modulus. Assuming the Generalized Riemann Hypothesis, we obtain a new Omega result.

AI.tldr: 在广义黎曼假设下，研究模数平方根以上长度的二次特征和的大值，获得新的Ω结果
AI.motivation: 研究二次特征和在求和长度超过模数平方根时的极值行为，这类问题在解析数论中具有重要意义
AI.method: 在广义黎曼假设(GRH)条件下，分析二次特征和的渐近行为，使用数论分析方法
AI.result: 获得了新的Ω结果，表明在某些条件下二次特征和可以达到较大的值
AI.conclusion: 在GRH假设下，证明了二次特征和在特定长度范围内存在较大的波动，推进了特征和极值理论的研究

title: The period map from commutative to noncommutative deformations
summary: We study the period map from infinitesimal deformations of a scheme $X$ over a perfect field $k$ to those of the associated $k$-linear $\infty$-category $\mathrm{QC}(X)$. For quasicompact, smooth, and separated $X$, we identify the corresponding map on tangent fibres with the dual HKR map $\mathrm{R}Γ(X, \mathrm{T}_X)[1] \to \mathrm{HH}^{\bullet}(X/k)[2]$, and give conditions for injectivity on homotopy groups. As applications, we prove liftability along square-zero extensions to be a derived invariant (at least when $\mathrm{char}(k) \ne 2$), and exhibit cases where the entire (classical) deformation functor of $X$ is a derived invariant; this partially answers a question of Lieblich.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了从概形X的无穷小形变到其关联的∞-范畴QC(X)形变的周期映射，证明了在特定条件下提升性沿平方零扩张是导出不变量，并部分回答了Lieblich的问题。
AI.motivation: 研究概形X的形变与其关联的∞-范畴QC(X)形变之间的关系，探索经典形变函子何时能成为导出不变量，回答Lieblich提出的相关问题。
AI.method: 通过分析从X的无穷小形变到QC(X)形变的周期映射，识别切纤维上的映射为对偶HKR映射，并给出同伦群上单射性的条件。
AI.result: 证明了在特征不为2的完美域上，沿平方零扩张的提升性是导出不变量；在某些情况下，X的整个经典形变函子也是导出不变量。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了概形形变与导出范畴形变之间的深刻联系，部分解决了Lieblich的问题，为导出几何中的形变理论提供了新见解。

title: Some Congruences Involving Fourth Powers of Generalized Central Trinomial Coefficients
summary: Let $ p \ge 5 $ be a prime and let $ b, c \in \mathbb{Z} $. Denote by $ T_k(b,c) $ the generalized central trinomial coefficient, i.e., the coefficient of $ x^k $ in $ (x^2 + bx + c)^k $. In this paper, we establish congruences modulo $ p^3 $ and $ p^4 $ for sums of the form $$ \sum_{k=0}^{p-1} (2k+1)^{2a+1}\,\varepsilon^{k}\,\frac{T_k(b,c)^4}{d^{2k}}, $$ where $ a \in \left\lbrace 0,1\right\rbrace $, $ \varepsilon \in \{1,-1\} $, and $ d = b^2 - 4c $ satisfies $ p \nmid d $. In particular, for the special case $ b = c = 1 $, we show that \begin{align*} \sum_{k=0}^{p-1}\left( 2k+1\right) ^{3} \frac{T_{k}^4}{9^k}\equiv -\frac{3p}{4}+\frac{3p^2}{4}\left( \frac{q_p(3)}{4}-1\right) \pmod{p^3}, \end{align*} where $T_k$ is the central trinomial coefficient and $q_p(a)$ is the Fermat quotient.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了广义中心三项式系数的模p^3和p^4同余性质，建立了包含(2k+1)幂次和T_k(b,c)^4的求和公式的模p高次同余关系。
AI.motivation: 研究广义中心三项式系数T_k(b,c)的模p高次同余性质，特别是当p为素数时，探索包含T_k(b,c)^4和(2k+1)幂次的求和公式在模p^3和p^4下的同余关系。
AI.method: 利用数论方法，特别是模p算术和组合恒等式，建立广义中心三项式系数T_k(b,c)的求和公式在模p^3和p^4下的同余关系。通过特殊化参数b=c=1，得到中心三项式系数T_k的具体同余公式。
AI.result: 建立了形如∑_{k=0}^{p-1} (2k+1)^{2a+1} ε^k T_k(b,c)^4/d^{2k}的求和公式在模p^3和p^4下的同余关系。特别地，当b=c=1时，证明了∑_{k=0}^{p-1} (2k+1)^3 T_k^4/9^k ≡ -3p/4 + 3p^2/4(q_p(3)/4 - 1) (mod p^3)，其中T_k为中心三项式系数，q_p(a)为费马商。
AI.conclusion: 该论文成功建立了广义中心三项式系数的高次模同余关系，为组合数论中的模p同余研究提供了新的结果，特别是在模p^3和p^4级别上给出了精确的同余公式。

title: Topology, Hyperbolicity, and the Shafarevich Conjecture for Complex Algebraic Varieties
summary: This survey presents recent developments concerning the Shafarevich conjecture, non-abelian Hodge theories, hyperbolicity, and the topology of complex algebraic varieties, as well as the interplay among these areas. More precisely, we present the main ideas and techniques involved in the linear versions of the following conjectures: the Shafarevich conjecture, the Chern-Hopf-Thurston conjecture, Kollár's conjecture on the holomorphic Euler characteristic, the de Oliveira-Katzarkov-Ramachandran conjecture, and Campana's nilpotency conjecture. In addition, we discuss characterizations of the hyperbolicity of complex quasi-projective varieties via representations of their fundamental groups, together with the generalized Green-Griffiths-Lang conjecture in the presence of a big local system.

AI.tldr: 该综述介绍了关于沙法列维奇猜想、非阿贝尔霍奇理论、双曲性和复代数簇拓扑的最新进展，重点讨论了这些领域之间的相互联系。
AI.motivation: 本文旨在综述复代数几何中几个重要猜想的最新发展，特别是这些猜想之间的相互联系，以及如何通过线性化方法来研究这些复杂的几何问题。
AI.method: 采用综述方法，重点介绍线性化版本的主要思想和技术，包括通过基本群的表示来刻画双曲性，以及在存在大局部系统时的广义Green-Griffiths-Lang猜想。
AI.result: 系统梳理了沙法列维奇猜想、Chern-Hopf-Thurston猜想、Kollár全纯欧拉示性数猜想、de Oliveira-Katzarkov-Ramachandran猜想和Campana幂零猜想等线性版本的研究进展。
AI.conclusion: 这些不同猜想之间存在着深刻的联系，通过基本群表示研究复代数簇的双曲性为理解这些猜想提供了统一框架，展示了代数几何、拓扑和表示论之间的丰富互动。

title: Notes on the LVP and the CVP in $p$-adic Fields
summary: This paper explores computational methods for solving the Longest Vector Problem (LVP) and Closest Vector Problem (CVP) in $p$-adic fields. Leveraging the non-Archimedean property of $p$-adic norms, we propose a polynomial time algorithm to compute orthogonal bases for $p$-adic lattices when the $p$-adic field is given by a minimal polynomial. The method utilizes the structure of maximal orders and $p$-radicals in extension fields of $\mathbb{Q}_{p}$ to efficiently construct uniformizers and residue field bases, enabling rapid solutions for LVP and CVP. In addition, we introduce the characterization of norms on vector spaces over $\mathbb{Q}_p$.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了在p-adic域中解决最长向量问题(LVP)和最近向量问题(CVP)的计算方法，利用p-adic范数的非阿基米德性质，为p-adic格构建多项式时间算法。
AI.motivation: 研究p-adic域中的格问题在计算数论和密码学中有重要应用，但现有的算法主要针对欧几里得格，需要开发专门处理p-adic格的高效计算方法。
AI.method: 利用p-adic范数的非阿基米德性质，通过最小多项式给定的p-adic域构造正交基。方法使用极大序和p-根的结构，在Qp的扩域中高效构造一致化元和剩余域基。
AI.result: 提出了多项式时间算法来计算p-adic格的正交基，能够快速解决LVP和CVP问题。同时引入了Qp上向量空间范数的特征化。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为p-adic域中的格问题提供了有效的计算方法，扩展了计算数论的工具箱，在密码学和编码理论中有潜在应用价值。

title: Poincaré duality for singular tropical hypersurfaces
summary: We find a partial extension of Poincaré duality theorem of Jell-Rau-Shaw to hypersurfaces obtained by non-primitive Viro's combinatorial patchworking. We define a classification of the triangulations of a lattice polytope by a level of primitivity and we find a partial Poincaré duality for patchworkings depending on the level of primitivity of the triangulation. Our notion of primitivity is defined modulo a certain integral domain, it is weaker than the classical definition of primitivity. We obtain also a generalization of the complete Poincaré duality over a certain integral domain to hypersurfaces obtained by patchworkings which are primitive modulo this integral domain. In particular, our corollary is that any tropical hypersurface obtained by patchworking from a triangulation of a simple lattice polytope satisfies complete Poincaré duality over the field of rationals, which is a converse of a theorem of Aksnes.

AI.tldr: 该论文将Poincaré对偶定理部分扩展到通过非原始Viro组合拼凑获得的光滑超曲面上，定义了格点多面体三角剖分的原始性级别，并建立了依赖于三角剖分原始性级别的部分Poincaré对偶性。
AI.motivation: 扩展Jell-Rau-Shaw的Poincaré对偶定理到更一般的超曲面情形，特别是通过非原始Viro组合拼凑方法构造的光滑超曲面，建立更一般的对偶性理论。
AI.method: 定义格点多面体三角剖分的原始性级别（相对于某个整环），提出比经典原始性更弱的概念；研究依赖于三角剖分原始性级别的拼凑方法，建立部分Poincaré对偶定理；对于在整环意义下原始的拼凑，获得完全Poincaré对偶的推广。
AI.result: 获得了部分Poincaré对偶定理，其成立程度取决于三角剖分的原始性级别；对于在整环意义下原始的拼凑，获得了完全Poincaré对偶的推广；特别地，证明了从简单格点多面体的三角剖分通过拼凑获得的任何热带超曲面在有理数域上满足完全Poincaré对偶，这是Aksnes定理的逆命题。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入原始性级别的概念，成功将Poincaré对偶定理扩展到更广泛的拼凑构造超曲面，建立了原始性级别与对偶性程度之间的对应关系，为热带几何中的对偶理论提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Explicit bounds for the graphicality of the prime gap sequence
summary:
We establish explicit unconditional results on the graphic properties of the prime gap sequence. Let \( p_n \) denote the \( n \)-th prime number (with $p_0=1$) and \( \mathrm{PD}_n = (p_\ell - p_{\ell-1})_{\ell=1}^n \) be the sequence of the first \( n \) prime gaps. Building upon the recent work by Erdős \emph{et al}, which proved the graphic nature of \( \mathrm{PD}_n \) for large \( n \) unconditionally, and for all \( n \) under RH, we provide the first explicit unconditional threshold such that:\\ (1) For all \( n \geq \exp\exp(30.5) \), \( \mathrm{PD}_n \) is graphic.\\ (2) For all \( n \geq \exp\exp(34.5) \), every realization \( G_n \) of \( \mathrm{PD}_n \) satisfies that \( (G_n, p_{n+1}-p_n) \) is DPG-graphic.
  Our proofs utilize a more refined criterion for when a sequence is graphic, and better estimates for the first moment of large prime gaps proven through an explicit zero-free region and explicit zero-density estimate for the Riemann zeta function.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了素数间隙序列图形性质的无条件显式结果，给出了PD_n序列为图形序列的显式阈值，并证明了相关DPG-图形性质。
AI.motivation: 基于Erdős等人最近的工作（证明了PD_n在大n下无条件为图形序列，在黎曼假设下对所有n成立），本文旨在提供第一个显式的无条件阈值，以确定PD_n何时为图形序列。
AI.method: 使用更精细的图形序列判定准则，通过显式的黎曼ζ函数无零区域和显式零密度估计，改进大素数间隙的一阶矩估计。
AI.result: (1) 对所有n ≥ exp(exp(30.5))，PD_n是图形序列；(2) 对所有n ≥ exp(exp(34.5))，PD_n的每个实现G_n都满足(G_n, p_{n+1}-p_n)是DPG-图形序列。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了素数间隙序列图形性质的显式无条件结果，给出了具体的数值阈值，推进了该领域的研究进展。

title: Strict germs on normal surface singularities
summary: We show that any holomorphic germ $f \colon (X,x_0) \to (Y,y_0)$ of topological degree $1$ between normal surface singularities can be written as $f=π\circ σ$, where $π\colon Y' \to (Y,y_0)$ is a modification and $σ\colon (X,x_0) \to (Y',y_1)$ is a local isomorphism sending $x_0$ to a point $y_1 \in π^{-1}(y_0)$. A result by Fantini, Favre and myself guarantees that when $f$ is a selfmap, then $(X,x_0)$ is a sandwiched singularity. We give here an alternative proof based on the construction of the associated Kato surfaces, and valuative dynamics.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了拓扑度为1的正规曲面奇点间全纯芽可以分解为修改和局部同构的复合，并给出了自映射情形下奇点为夹层奇点的替代证明。
AI.motivation: 研究正规曲面奇点间拓扑度为1的全纯芽的结构分解问题，特别是自映射情形下奇点类型的确定。
AI.method: 1. 证明任何拓扑度为1的全纯芽f可以分解为修改π和局部同构σ的复合；2. 对于自映射情形，通过构造关联的Kato曲面和赋值动力学给出替代证明。
AI.result: 1. 建立了f=π∘σ的分解定理；2. 当f是自映射时，(X,x₀)必须是夹层奇点，这为Fantini-Favre-作者先前结果的替代证明。
AI.conclusion: 拓扑度为1的正规曲面奇点间全纯芽具有修改-局部同构分解结构，自映射情形下源奇点必为夹层奇点，这通过Kato曲面构造和赋值动力学方法得到验证。

title: On $\mathrm{Ext}^{\bullet}$ between locally analytic generalized Steinberg with applications
summary: Let $n\geq 2$ be an integer, $p$ be a prime number and $K$ be a finite extension of $\mathbb{Q}_p$. Motivated by Schraen's thesis and Gehrmann's definition of automorphic simple $\mathscr{L}$-invariants, we study the first non-vanishing extension groups between a pair of locally $K$-analytic generalized Steinberg representations of $\mathrm{GL}_n(K)$. We study subspaces of these extension groups defined by using either relative conditions with respect to Lie subalgebras of $\mathfrak{s}\mathfrak{l}_{n}$ (isomorphic to $\mathfrak{s}\mathfrak{l}_{m}$ for some $2\leq m<n$) or maps between locally $K$-analytic generalized Steinberg representations of $\mathrm{GL}_n(K)$ with different highest weights. The applications of these computations are two-fold. On one hand, we prove that a certain universal successive extension of filtered $(\varphi,N)$-modules can be realized as the space of homomorphisms from a suitable shift of the dual of locally $K$-analytic Steinberg representation into the de Rham complex of the Drinfeld upper-half space, generalizing one main result of Schraen's thesis from $\mathrm{GL}_{3}(\mathbb{Q}_p)$ to $\mathrm{GL}_{n}(K)$. On the other hand, we give a definition of higher $\mathscr{L}$-invariants for $\mathrm{GL}_n(K)$ (which we call Breuil-Schraen $\mathscr{L}$-invariants) and discuss its possible explicit relation to Fontaine-Mazur $\mathscr{L}$-invariants, using ideas from Breuil-Ding's higher $\mathscr{L}$-invariants for $\mathrm{GL}_{3}(\mathbb{Q}_p)$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了GL_n(K)的局部K-解析广义Steinberg表示之间的扩展群，定义了Breuil-Schraen L-不变量，并建立了与过滤(φ,N)-模和Drinfeld上半空间de Rham复形的联系。
AI.motivation: 受Schraen博士论文和Gehrmann关于自守简单L-不变量的定义启发，研究GL_n(K)的局部K-解析广义Steinberg表示之间的扩展群，旨在推广Schraen在GL_3(Q_p)的结果到GL_n(K)，并定义更高阶的L-不变量。
AI.method: 通过使用sl_n的李子代数（同构于sl_m，2≤m<n）的相对条件，或具有不同最高权的GL_n(K)局部K-解析广义Steinberg表示之间的映射，研究扩展群的子空间。计算这些扩展群并应用于两个方向。
AI.result: 证明了过滤(φ,N)-模的某个通用连续扩展可以实现为从局部K-解析Steinberg表示对偶的适当平移到Drinfeld上半空间de Rham复形的同态空间，将Schraen的主要结果从GL_3(Q_p)推广到GL_n(K)。定义了GL_n(K)的高阶L-不变量（Breuil-Schraen L-不变量）。

title: On $\mathscr{M}$-arrangements of conics and lines with ordinary singularities
summary: In this paper, we study combinatorial aspects of reduced plane curves known as $\mathscr{M}$-curves. This notation is a natural generalization of maximizing plane curves which are well-known in the theory of algebraic surfaces. We focus here on $\mathscr{M}$-arrangements of conics and lines with ordinary singularities of multiplicity less than five and we provide various numerical constraints on their existence, particularly in terms of their weak combinatorics. Moreover, we study in detail the scenario when our $\mathscr{M}$-arrangements consist of lines and just one conic.

AI.tldr: 研究具有普通奇点（重数小于5）的M-曲线排列组合性质，特别关注由直线和一条圆锥曲线构成的M-排列
AI.motivation: M-曲线是最大化平面曲线的自然推广，在代数曲面理论中具有重要意义。研究这类曲线的组合性质有助于理解代数曲面的结构特性
AI.method: 研究具有普通奇点且重数小于5的M-排列（圆锥曲线和直线的组合），特别关注仅包含一条圆锥曲线和若干直线的排列情况
AI.result: 提供了M-排列存在的各种数值约束条件，特别是在弱组合学意义上的约束
AI.conclusion: 详细分析了由直线和一条圆锥曲线构成的M-排列场景，为理解这类代数曲线的组合性质提供了理论基础

title: On Trivial Cyclically Covering Subspaces of $\mathbb{F}_q^n$ in Non-Coprime Characteristic
summary:
A subspace $U$ of $\mathbb{F}_q^n$ is called \textit{cyclically covering} if the whole space $\mathbb{F}_q^n$ is the union of the cyclic shifts of $U$. The case $\mathbb{F}_q^n$ itself is the only covering subspace, is of particular interest. Recently, Huang solved this problem completely under the condition $\gcd(n, q)=1$ using primitive idempotents and trace functions, and explicitly posed the non-coprime case as an open question.
  This paper provides a complete answer to Huang's question. We prove that if $n = p^k m$ where $p = \operatorname{char}(\mathbb{F}_q)$ and $\gcd(m, p)=1$, then $h_q(p^k m) = 0$ if and only if $h_q(m) = 0$. This result fully reduces the non-coprime case to the coprime case settled by Huang. Our proof employs the structure theory of cyclic group algebras in modular characteristic.

AI.tldr: 该论文解决了Huang提出的关于循环覆盖子空间的非互质情况问题，证明了当n=p^km时，h_q(p^km)=0当且仅当h_q(m)=0，将非互质情况完全归约为Huang已解决的互质情况。
AI.motivation: Huang最近在gcd(n,q)=1的条件下完全解决了循环覆盖子空间问题，但明确提出了非互质情况作为开放问题。本文旨在解决这个开放问题，为循环覆盖子空间理论提供完整的答案。
AI.method: 采用模特征下循环群代数的结构理论来证明主要结果。通过分析n=p^km的形式，其中p是特征，证明h_q(p^km)=0当且仅当h_q(m)=0。
AI.result: 证明了当n=p^km时，h_q(p^km)=0当且仅当h_q(m)=0。这个结果将非互质情况完全归约为Huang已解决的互质情况，从而完全回答了Huang的问题。
AI.conclusion: 本文完全解决了Huang关于循环覆盖子空间的开放问题，为循环覆盖子空间理论提供了完整的解决方案，将非互质情况归约为已解决的互质情况。

title: Generalised Hermite-Einstein Fibre Metrics and Slope Stability for Holomorphic Vector Bundles
summary: Let $X$ be a compact complex manifold of dimension $n$ and let $m$ be a positive integer with $m\leq n$. Assume that $X$ admits a Kähler metric $ω$ and a weakly positive, $\partial\bar\partial$-closed, smooth $(n-m,\,n-m)$-form $Ω$. We introduce the notions of $(ω,\,Ω)$-Hermite-Einstein holomorphic vector bundles and $(ω,\,Ω)$(-semi)-stable coherent sheaves on $X$ by generalising the classical definitions depending only on $ω$. We then prove that the $(ω,\,Ω)$-Hermite-Einstein condition implies the $(ω,\,Ω)$-semi-stability of a holomorphic vector bundle and its splitting into $(ω,\,Ω)$-stable subbundles. This extends a classical result by Kobayashi and Lübke to our generalised setting.

AI.tldr: 该论文将经典Kobayashi-Lübke定理推广到更一般的几何设置，引入了依赖于Kähler度量ω和弱正、∂∂̅-闭的(n-m,n-m)-形式Ω的Hermite-Einstein条件和稳定性概念。
AI.motivation: 经典Hermite-Einstein理论和稳定性理论仅依赖于Kähler度量ω，本文旨在将其推广到同时依赖于ω和附加几何结构Ω的更一般框架，以处理更广泛的几何情形。
AI.method: 引入(ω,Ω)-Hermite-Einstein全纯向量丛和(ω,Ω)(半)稳定凝聚层的概念，通过推广仅依赖于ω的经典定义，建立新的几何框架。
AI.result: 证明了(ω,Ω)-Hermite-Einstein条件蕴含(ω,Ω)-半稳定性，并且全纯向量丛可以分裂为(ω,Ω)-稳定子丛，这是Kobayashi-Lübke定理在广义设置下的推广。
AI.conclusion: 成功将经典Hermite-Einstein理论和稳定性理论推广到同时依赖于Kähler度量ω和附加形式Ω的更一般几何框架，为相关几何问题的研究提供了新工具。

title: Regulators on some abelian coverings of $\mathbb{P}^1$ minus $n+2$ points
summary: In this paper, we construct certain rational or integral elements in the motivic cohomology of superelliptic curves which are quotient curves of abelian coverings of $\mathbb{P}^1$ minus $n+2$ points, and prove that these elements are non-trivial by expressing their regulators in terms of Appell-Lauricella hypergeometric functions. We also check that such elements are integral under a mild assumption. We also give various numerical examples for the Beilinson conjecture on special values of $L$-functions of the superelliptic curves by using hypergeometric expressions.

AI.tldr: 本文在超椭圆曲线的 motivic 上同调中构造了有理或整元素，并通过将它们的调节子表示为 Appell-Lauricella 超几何函数来证明这些元素非平凡，同时验证了在温和假设下这些元素是整的，并利用超几何表达式为超椭圆曲线的 L-函数特殊值的 Beilinson 猜想提供了数值示例。
AI.motivation: 研究超椭圆曲线的 motivic 上同调中的有理或整元素，这些曲线是 $\mathbb{P}^1$ 去掉 $n+2$ 个点的阿贝尔覆盖的商曲线，旨在构造具体的非平凡元素并验证 Beilinson 猜想。
AI.method: 构造超椭圆曲线 motivic 上同调中的有理或整元素，通过将调节子表示为 Appell-Lauricella 超几何函数来证明这些元素的非平凡性，并在温和假设下验证其整性，最后利用超几何表达式为 Beilinson 猜想提供数值验证。
AI.result: 成功构造了超椭圆曲线 motivic 上同调中的有理或整元素，证明了这些元素非平凡，验证了在温和假设下这些元素是整的，并通过超几何表达式为 Beilinson 猜想提供了各种数值示例。
AI.conclusion: 本文通过超几何函数方法在超椭圆曲线的 motivic 上同调中构造并验证了非平凡的有理/整元素，为 Beilinson 猜想提供了数值支持，建立了超几何函数与 motivic 上同调元素之间的重要联系。

title: Cartier duality for gerbes of vector bundles
summary: We prove a Cartier duality for gerbes of algebraic and analytic vector bundles as an anti-equivalence of Hopf algebras in the category of kernels of analytic stacks. As an application, we prove that the category of solid quasi-coherent sheaves on the Hodge-Tate stack of a smooth rigid variety over an algebraically closed field $C$ of mixed characteristic $(0,p)$ is equivalent to the category of weight $1$ sheaves on Bhatt-Zhang's Simpson gerbe.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了代数与解析向量丛的gerbes的Cartier对偶性，并应用于刚性簇的Hodge-Tate栈上拟凝聚层范畴与Simpson gerbe上权1层范畴的等价性。
AI.motivation: 研究代数与解析向量丛gerbes的Cartier对偶性，并将其应用于混合特征刚性簇的Hodge-Tate几何与Simpson gerbe理论之间的联系。
AI.method: 证明解析栈核范畴中代数与解析向量丛gerbes的Cartier对偶性，建立Hopf代数的反等价关系，并应用于Bhatt-Zhang的Simpson gerbe理论。
AI.result: 成功建立了gerbes的Cartier对偶性作为Hopf代数的反等价，并证明了混合特征光滑刚性簇的Hodge-Tate栈上固体拟凝聚层范畴与Simpson gerbe上权1层范畴的等价性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了代数几何与p-adic Hodge理论中gerbes对偶性的新联系，为理解混合特征几何中的层范畴等价提供了理论框架。

title: Average first-passage times for character sums
summary: Let $\varepsilon>0$ and, for an odd prime $p$, set $$ S_\ell(p):=\sum_{n\le \ell}\left(\frac{n}{p}\right). $$ Define the first-passage time $$ f_\varepsilon(p):=\min\{\ell\ge 1:\ S_\ell(p)<\varepsilon\ell\}. $$ We prove that there exists a constant $c_\varepsilon>0$ such that, as $x\to\infty$, $$ \sum_{p\le x} f_\varepsilon(p)\sim c_\varepsilon \frac{x}{\log x}. $$

AI.tldr: 研究奇素数p的Legendre符号部分和S_ℓ(p)首次低于εℓ的时间f_ε(p)的渐近行为，证明其求和与x/log x成正比
AI.motivation: 研究Legendre符号部分和的首次通过时间分布，这是数论中关于二次特征和的重要问题，涉及随机游走和数论概率的交叉领域
AI.method: 使用解析数论方法，特别是素数分布理论和特征和估计技术，通过研究Legendre符号部分和的统计性质来证明渐近公式
AI.result: 证明存在常数c_ε>0，使得当x→∞时，∑_{p≤x} f_ε(p) ∼ c_ε x/log x，即首次通过时间的和与素数计数函数x/log x成正比
AI.conclusion: Legendre符号部分和的首次通过时间在素数上的分布具有明确的渐近行为，这为理解二次特征和的随机性质提供了重要结果

title: Mod $p$ Poincaré duality for $p$-adic period domains
summary: In this article, we introduce a new class of smooth partially proper rigid analytic varieties over a $p$-adic field that satisfy Poincaré duality for étale cohomology with mod $p$-coefficients : the varieties satisfying "primitive comparison with compact support". We show that almost proper varieties, as well as p-adic (weakly admissible) period domains in the sense of Rappoport-Zink belong to this class. In particular, we recover Poincaré duality for almost proper varieties as first established by Li-Reinecke-Zavyalov, and we compute the étale cohomology with $\mathbb{F}_p$-coefficients of p-adic period domains, generalizing a computation of Colmez-Dospinescu-Niziol for Drinfeld's symmetric spaces. The arguments used in this paper rely crucially on Mann's six functors formalism for solid $\mathcal{O}^{+,a}/π$ coefficients.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了一类满足"带紧支集的原始比较定理"的p-adic刚性解析簇，证明了几乎真簇和p-adic周期域属于此类，从而恢复了Li-Reinecke-Zavyalov的庞加莱对偶结果，并计算了周期域的étale上同调。
AI.motivation: 研究p-adic刚性解析簇的étale上同调理论，特别是寻找满足庞加莱对偶的簇类，以统一处理几乎真簇和p-adic周期域的上同调性质。
AI.method: 引入"带紧支集的原始比较定理"这一新概念，利用Mann的六函子形式体系处理固体系数$\mathcal{O}^{+,a}/π$，证明几乎真簇和Rappoport-Zink意义下的p-adic周期域满足该条件。
AI.result: 建立了满足"带紧支集的原始比较定理"的簇类，恢复了几乎真簇的庞加莱对偶，计算了p-adic周期域的$\mathbb{F}_p$-系数étale上同调，推广了Colmez-Dospinescu-Niziol对Drinfeld对称空间的计算。
AI.conclusion: "带紧支集的原始比较定理"为研究p-adic刚性解析簇的étale上同调提供了有效框架，统一处理了几乎真簇和周期域，其证明依赖于Mann的固体系数六函子形式体系。

title: Rational Angle Bisection Problem in Higher Dimensional Spaces and Incenters of Simplices over Fields
summary: In this article, we generalize the following problem, which is called the rational angle bisection problem, to the $n$-dimensional space $k^n$ over a subfield $k$ of $\mathbb R$: on the coordinate plane, for which rational numbers $a$ and $b$ are the slopes of the angle bisectors between two lines with slopes $a$ and $b$ rational? First, we give a few characterizations of when the angle bisectors between two lines with direction vectors in $k^n$ have direction vectors in $k^n.$ To find solutions to the problem in the case when $k = \mathbb Q,$ we also give a formula for the integral solutions of $x_1{}^2+\dots +x_n{}^2 = dx_{n+1}{}^2,$ which is a generalization of the negative Pell's equation $x^2-dy^2 = -1,$ where $d$ is a square-free positive integer. Second, by applying the above characterizations, we give a necessary and sufficient condition for the incenter of a given $n$-simplex with $k$-rational vertices to be $k$-rational. On the coordinate plane, we prove that every triangle with $k$-rational vertices and incenter can be obtained by scaling a triangle with $k$-rational side lengths and area, which is a generalization of a Heronian triangle. We also state certain fundamental properties of a few centers of a given triangle with $k$-rational vertices.

AI.tldr: 本文将有理角平分线问题推广到n维空间，研究了角度平分线方向向量保持有理性的条件，并给出了n维单纯形内心为有理点的充要条件。
AI.motivation: 研究在n维空间中，两条直线的角平分线方向向量何时保持有理性，以及n维单纯形的内心何时为有理点，这是对经典有理角平分线问题的推广。
AI.method: 首先给出了角平分线方向向量保持有理性的几个特征化条件；然后推导了方程x₁²+...+xₙ² = dxₙ₊₁²的整数解公式，这是负佩尔方程x²-dy² = -1的推广；最后应用这些特征化条件分析n维单纯形内心的有理性。
AI.result: 得到了角平分线方向向量保持有理性的特征化条件；给出了广义负佩尔方程的整数解公式；建立了n维单纯形内心为有理点的充要条件；证明了平面上每个有理顶点且内心为有理点的三角形都可以通过缩放一个有理边长和面积的三角形得到。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将有理角平分线问题推广到n维空间，建立了角平分线方向向量有理性的完整理论，并应用于n维单纯形内心有理性的研究，为有理几何问题提供了新的工具和结果。

title: The Hochschild homology of a noncommutative symmetric quotient stack
summary: We prove an orbifold type decomposition theorem for the Hochschild homology of the symmetric powers of a small DG category $\mathcal{A}$. In noncommutative geometry, these can be viewed as the noncommutative symmetric quotient stacks of $\mathcal{A}$. We use this decomposition to show that the total Hochschild homology of the symmetric powers of $\mathcal{A}$ is isomorphic to the symmetric algebra $S^*(\mathrm{HH}_\bullet(\mathcal{A}) \otimes t \mathbb{k}[t])$. Our methods are explicit - we construct mutually inverse homotopy equivalences of the standard Hochschild complexes involved. These explicit maps are then used to induce from the symmetric algebra onto the total Hochschild homology the structures of the Fock space for the Heisenberg algebra of $\mathcal{A}$, of a Hopf algebra, and of a free $λ$-ring generated by $\mathrm{HH}_\bullet(\mathcal{A})$.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了对称幂的Hochschild同调具有轨道折叠型分解定理，并建立了与对称代数的同构关系
AI.motivation: 研究小DG范畴对称幂的Hochschild同调结构，在非交换几何中将其视为非交换对称商叠
AI.method: 构造标准Hochschild复形之间的互逆同伦等价，使用显式映射方法
AI.result: 证明了对称幂的总Hochschild同调同构于对称代数S*(HH_•(A)⊗tk[t])，并诱导出Heisenberg代数的Fock空间结构、Hopf代数结构和自由λ-环结构
AI.conclusion: 建立了对称幂Hochschild同调的完整代数结构，为理解非交换对称商叠提供了代数工具

title: Counting Lattices with Local Hecke Series
summary: We count the maximal lattices over $p$-adic fields and the rational number field. For this, we use the theory of Hecke series for a reductive group over nonarchimedean local fields, which was developed by Andrianov and Hina-Sugano. By treating the Euler factors of the counting Dirichlet series for lattices, we obtain zeta functions of classical groups, which were earlier studied with $p$-adic cone integrals. When our counting series equals the existing zeta functions of groups, we recover the known results in a simple way. Further we obtain some new zeta functions for non-split even orthogonal and odd orthogonal groups.

AI.tldr: 本文使用Hecke级数理论计算p-adic域和有理数域上的极大格数量，通过格计数Dirichlet级数的Euler因子得到经典群的zeta函数，部分结果与已知一致，同时得到了非分裂偶正交群和奇正交群的新zeta函数。
AI.motivation: 研究p-adic域和有理数域上极大格的数量计数问题，建立格计数与经典群zeta函数之间的联系。
AI.method: 使用Andrianov和Hina-Sugano发展的非阿基米德局部域上约化群的Hecke级数理论，通过处理格计数Dirichlet级数的Euler因子来获得经典群的zeta函数。
AI.result: 当计数级数与现有群zeta函数相等时，以简单方式恢复了已知结果；进一步得到了非分裂偶正交群和奇正交群的一些新zeta函数。
AI.conclusion: Hecke级数理论为计算p-adic域和有理数域上极大格数量提供了有效方法，建立了格计数与群zeta函数的联系，并扩展了非分裂正交群的zeta函数理论。

title: Isomorphism between Hopf algebras for multiple zeta values
summary: The classical quasi-shuffle algebra for multiple zeta values have a well-known Hopf algebra structure. Recently, the shuffle algebra for multiple zeta values are also equipped with a Hopf algebra structure. This paper shows that these two Hopf algebras are isomorphic.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了多重zeta值的准洗牌代数与洗牌代数这两种Hopf代数结构是同构的
AI.motivation: 多重zeta值的准洗牌代数已有已知的Hopf代数结构，最近洗牌代数也被赋予了Hopf代数结构。研究者希望探究这两种代数结构之间的关系。
AI.method: 通过代数结构分析，证明准洗牌代数与洗牌代数作为Hopf代数是同构的
AI.result: 成功证明了多重zeta值的准洗牌代数与洗牌代数这两种Hopf代数结构是同构的
AI.conclusion: 多重zeta值的准洗牌代数与洗牌代数具有同构的Hopf代数结构，这深化了对多重zeta值代数结构的理解

title: Number of $K$-rational points with given $j$-invariant on modular curves
summary:
In this article, we study how to compute the number of $K$-rational points with a given $j$-invariant on an arbitrary modular curve. As an application, for each positive integer $n$, we determine the list of possible numbers of cyclic $n$-isogenies an elliptic curve over some number field can admit. Similarly, for an odd prime power $p^k$, we calculate the possible values for the number of points above some $j$-invariant on Cartan modular curves $X_{\mathrm s}(p^k)$, $X_{\mathrm{ns}}(p^k)$ and their normalizers.
  Combining known results about images of Galois representations of CM elliptic curves with our work, we also devise a simple algorithm to determine the number of rational CM points on any modular curve.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究如何计算任意模曲线上具有给定j不变量的K有理点数量，并应用于确定椭圆曲线在不同数域上可能存在的循环n同源数量，以及计算Cartan模曲线上特定j不变量的点数量。
AI.motivation: 研究模曲线上具有特定j不变量的有理点数量问题，这对于理解椭圆曲线的同源结构和Galois表示有重要意义，特别是在数论和算术几何领域。
AI.method: 通过研究模曲线上K有理点的计算方法，结合已知的CM椭圆曲线的Galois表示结果，开发算法来确定任意模曲线上的有理CM点数量。

title: The splitting field and generators of the elliptic surface $Y^2=X^3 +t^{360} +1$
summary:
The splitting field of an elliptic surface $\mathcal{E}/\mathbb{Q}(t)$ is the smallest finite extension $\mathcal{K} \subset \mathbb{C}$ such that all $\mathbb{C}(t)$-rational points are defined over $\mathcal{K}(t)$. In this paper, we provide a symbolic algorithmic approach to determine the splitting field and a set of $68$ linearly independent generators for the Mordell--Weil lattice of Shioda's elliptic surface $Y^2=X^3 +t^{360} +1$. This surface is noted for having the largest known rank 68 for an elliptic curve over $\mathbb{C}(t)$.
  Our methodology utilizes the known decomposition of the Mordell-Weil Lattice of this surface into Lattices of ten rational elliptic surfaces and one $K3$ surface. We explicitly compute the defining polynomials of the splitting field, which reach degrees of 1728 and 5760, and verify the results via height pairing matrices and specialized symbolic software packages.

title: Green's function on the Tate curve
summary: Motivated by the question of defining a $p$-adic string worldsheet action in genus one, we define a Laplacian operator on the Tate curve, and study its Green's function. We show that the Green's function exists. We provide an explicit formula for the Green's function, which turns out to be a non-Archimedean counterpart of the Archimedean Green's function on a flat torus.

title: The least prime with a given cycle type
summary: Let $G$ be a finite group. Let $K/k$ be a Galois extension of number fields with Galois group isomorphic to $G$, and let $C \subseteq \mathrm{Gal}(K/k) \simeq G$ be a conjugacy invariant subset. It is well known that there exists an unramified prime ideal $\mathfrak{p}$ of $k$ with Frobenius element lying in $C$ and norm satisfying $\mathrm{N}\mathfrak{p} \ll |\mathrm{Disc}(K)|^α$ for some constant $α= α(G,C)$. There is a rich literature establishing unconditional admissible values for $α$, with most approaches proceeding by studying the zeros of $L$-functions. We give an alternative approach, not relying on zeros, that often substantially improves this exponent $α$ for any fixed finite group $G$, provided $C$ is a union of rational equivalence classes. As a particularly striking example, we prove that there exist absolute constants $c_1,c_2 > 0$ such that for any $n\geq 2$ and any conjugacy class $C \subset S_n$, one may take $α(S_n,C) = c_1 \exp(-c_2n)$. Our approach reduces the core problem to a question in character theory.
